text: Guillaume André d'Hébert (15 January 1653, Paris - 6 May 1725) was Governor General of Pondicherry for two periods. He was preceded by Pierre Dulivier and succeeded by Pierre André Prévost de La Prévostière . ==Titles== ==References== * Category:1653 births Category:1725 deaths Category:Governors of French India Category:French colonial governors and administrators Category:People from Paris
title: Guillaume André d'Hébert
